featured.text: The severity of tropical diseases is also a matter of whether governments are capable—and willing— to defend their populations against infections.
Doing so may cause a severe eye infection.
Green tea is also helpful 18 infection and damaged immune function.
Tropical infections are thus as much related to government inaction as they are to climate.

definition.zh_def: 感染是指病原體（如細菌、病毒或真菌）進入身體並引起疾病的過程。
definition.en_def: Infection is the process by which pathogens (such as bacteria, viruses, or fungi) enter the body and cause disease.
definition.example: The doctor prescribed antibiotics to treat the bacterial infection.
